abstract: Sacramento prison officials announce that Hugo Pinell was killed by fellow inmate, which led to riot involving 70 other inmates; Pinell was involved in escape attempt from San Quentin prison in 1971.
lead_paragraph: A fellow prisoner killed 71-year-old Hugo Pinell, officials said, setting off a riot that involved about 70 inmates.

headline.main: Figure in 1971 San Quentin Escape Bid Is Killed
headline.print_headline: Figure in 1971 Escape Bid Is Killed

snippet: A fellow prisoner killed 71-year-old Hugo Pinell, officials said, setting off a riot that involved about 70 inmates.
